name: @U2NewsBrief
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The @U2 News Brief brings you the latest U2 news and information from the independent fan site, www.atu2.com. You'll get a regularly updated audio recap typically delivered in 1-2 minutes.

Add the @U2 News Brief to your Flash Briefing and move it to the top of your news by going to "Settings" and then selecting "Flash Briefing" in the Alexa app. After enabling our skill, just ask "Alexa, what's my flash briefing?" or "Alexa, what's in the news?" to hear our latest update!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
